data.comment: Today's referee, Wesli De Cremer, has blown to start the match.
Kristiyan Malinov (Oud-Heverlee) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Xavier Mercier.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Aleksandar Vukotic is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Beveren.
Joe Efford is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Jenthe Mertens.
In the minute 58, Sascha Kotysch puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Xavier Mercier instrumental with a fine assist.
Aboubakar Keita is on a sub for Kristiyan Malinov for Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 70, Waasland-Beveren make their first substitution with Stefan Milosevic replacing Daan Heymans.
The home team replace Yuki Kobayashi with Matthias Verreth.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a third substitution, with Djihad Bizimana replacing Jenthe Mertens.
In the minute 85, Marc Brys (Oud-Heverlee) is making a second change, with Olivier Myny replacing the possibly injured Yannick Aguemon.
Wesli De Cremer blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee extend their lead to 1-3 through Thomas Henry.
Olivier Myny with an assist there.
Yohan Croizet is replacing Xavier Mercier for the away team.
Maximiliano Caufriez Waasland-Beveren.
